en: My mom is calling. She says it's 'an emergency,' and you know how those go. Can you please handle this? After our last fight, I don't know if I can talk to her.

no_caption: She's your mother. You handle it.

en: none::You hate these calls with Skylar's panicky mother, but you know the consequences for not helping out would be much worse than the benefits of not doing it.
none::You know the conversation will last the entire night, and you can't be bothered. Skylar looks at you as though seeing you for the first time.
